title: Poppy Solves Bot Lane Issues
body:
{{champion:78}} Hello. I am Poppy. Welcome to my office.
{{champion:78}} As I grow bored this day, I shall assist the champions that frequent the bottom lane.
{{champion:78}} This will amuse me.
{{champion:78}} Next.
{{champion:22}} Poppy.
{{champion:37}} ...
{{champion:78}} What is your grievance?
{{champion:22}} She won't communicate with me Poppy. Not one word.
{{champion:78}} And why is this?
{{champion:22}} She is a mute. She has no voice. This is the problem.
{{champion:78}} Is this true, girl?
{{champion:37}} ...
{{champion:78}} Girl. When I speak to you, you will answer me.
{{champion:37}} ...
{{champion:78}} You dare disobey me? Perhaps I shall become Lollipoppy this day. Do you wish to gaze into the eyes of pure malice?!
{{champion:37}} No Poppy! Don't-! Wait... my voice... I can speak!
{{champion:78}} Fear can move mountains, girl.
{{champion:78}} I see no further issue here. Leave me.
{{champion:22}} Thank you so much, Poppy!
{{champion:37}} My whole life has been a lie...
{{champion:78}} Next.
{{champion:16}} Poppy.
{{champion:96}} Hmm.
{{champion:78}} What is your grievance?
{{champion:16}} It's my marksman, Poppy. He's a cute doggy, but he eats so much.
{{champion:96}} Feast!
{{champion:16}} He's eating my bananas almost as quickly as I throw them! And he just goes crazy when he's around his favorite treat. Yordles...
{{champion:96}} YUM.
{{champion:78}} Turn your gaze away from me, stray.
{{champion:78}} _Or you will hunger no more._
{{champion:96}} FEAST! GAHH!
{{champion:16}} No! Down Koggles! Down boy! Don't bite!
{{champion:16}} Don't bit- Wait. Please no. Don't do this...
{{champion:16}} I BEG YOU! DON'T!
{{champion:16}} You... you bit off the head. You've consumed the body whole. I see the darkness here!
{{champion:16}} You're a creature! A monster from the void! You're going to consume us all! I see it all, now!
{{champion:78}} You flatter me, my dear.
{{champion:78}} Now, you're going to need a new marksman. Sivir, come.
{{champion:15}} I heard my name.
{{champion:15}} What happened here?! Soraka is sobbing uncontrollably and you're covered in blood! Poppy, are you injured?
{{champion:78}} Ha.
{{champion:78}} Haha.
{{champion:78}} GAHAHAHA.
{{champion:78}} There is only one weapon on this realm that may harm me...
{{champion:78}} _And I use it as my toothpick._
{{champion:78}} But on topic, this goat needs a new partner. Are you allergic to bananas?
{{champion:15}} No...
{{champion:78}} I see no further issue here. Leave me.
{{champion:15}} Come Soraka, you can tell me about why you're crying.
{{champion:16}} I have witnessed the darkness... the darkness...
{{champion:78}} Next.
{{champion:81}} Poppy.
{{champion:78}} What is your grievance?
{{champion:81}} It's my support. He won't... LEAVE me alone.
{{champion:81}} Ever.
{{champion:81}} Not even when I bathe.
{{champion:81}} In fact, he's here right now. But hidden.
{{champion:78}} None may hide from me. What use is concealing your physical body...
{{champion:78}} _When I can see into your soul?_
{{champion:78}} Come out, Taric.
{{champion:44}} Forgive my rudeness, Poppy.
{{champion:81}} There! You see! He's always there!
{{champion:44}} Poppy, I'm sure you know I just want to show my marksman...
{{champion:44}} _The ins and outs of being my partner._
{{champion:78}} Hmm.
{{champion:78}} You amuse me Taric.
{{champion:78}} On the day of reckoning when I become Lollipoppy and rain death and destruction upon all...
{{champion:78}} I will kill you last.
{{champion:44}} You are very kind, Poppy.
{{champion:44}} We will take our leave now.
{{champion:81}} No! Poppy! Do not let him take me! Do you know mercy?!
{{champion:78}} No.
{{champion:78}} I see no further issue here. Leave me.
{{champion:81}} Help me! Someone!
{{champion:44}} Oh Ezreal. You should know by now you can't struggle away from...
{{champion:44}} _My gems._
{{champion:78}} Time for one more before I grow bored of this.
{{champion:78}} Next.
{{champion:82}} Poppy.
{{champion:78}} Mordekaiser.
{{champion:82}} ...
{{champion:78}} ...
{{champion:82}} I need a sup-
{{champion:78}} Get out.

replies.body:
This is fantastic.

<3 Taric
can we move {{champion:78}} to a bot lane "ADC alternative" so {{champion:82}} can stay mid? I think she would work better anyway :L

Damage immunity ult.
Immunity to burst.
Defense steroid.

Replace the ar/mr with a shield. Let her build BT.
***PERFECT!***

{{champion:53}} : Come ere poppy!
{{champion:78}} :u wot m8
*grabs poppy*
"An Allie has been slain"
"Enemy is on a killing spree
{{item:3070}} {{champion:53}}: i was only doing my job ;_:

{{champion:16}} She hit lvl 6. My job is done.
. . . z Z z Z z Z z Z z Z z Z . . .

> {{champion:78}} There is only one weapon on this realm that may harm me...
> {{champion:78}} _And I use it as my toothpick._

Wait... So poppy uses the fountain laser as her toothpick?!
She has to maintain that patented Lollipoppy smile somehow.
That ending lol. I died.
poppy isnt op stop crying kid
Actually, that's why she's getting reworked. -_-
broken =/= op

Poppy is OP, it's just her early game is so bad people don't want to deal with it.  Riot flat out said that if someone finds a way to make her early game work in LCS, she's getting dumpstered immediately.
Funny thing is, she was made viable for a match, the team won, and she remained surprisingly undumpstered

The only real reason for that is because she wasn't really picked up again after that, and there was no surge in popularity.  If there had been a surge in popularity, you can bet measures would have been taken.

Plus it was a match against a champion the casters outright said couldn't kill Poppy (Mundo) because his harass could never deal anything near full damage to Poppy, he tends to love building health while Poppy loves destroying you because you built health, and Mundo doesn't have a great early laning phase in general which allowed Poppy to become a threat very quickly. 

Basically, it was the perfect set-up for Poppy so it isn't surprising that she was used there. I can't think of any other top laner that would have really allowed for a good enemy Poppy set-up.

> [{quoted}](name=Marik Winters,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jIqANElX,comment-id=00020000000000000001,timestamp=2015-08-15T01:37:26.735+0000)
>
> Funny thing is, she was made viable for a match, the team won, and she remained surprisingly undumpstered

to quote tumblr: source????? like seriously i want to see this
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eSAQ_eTenfw

I read from a Red that as long as Poppy remains a pocket pick instead of pick-and-ban (she's *allowed* to be used every once in awhile, they're more talking about she finds solid success in LCS, becomes FotM, and the game breaks because it can't handle the terror).
yeah she is a stupid hypercarry when she gets going.
Her everything-ignoring ult totally isn't a big part of the problem. (>_>)

> [{quoted}](name=Bard in a Diaper,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jIqANElX,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-14T18:37:40.974+0000)
>
> poppy isnt op stop crying kid

How in the world did you get a complaint out of this gem of a thread?






{{champion:44}}
That ending.

When Taric says he will show you "The ins and outs of being my partner." 
Ez better know not to drop the soap

*Ez better know to ALWAYS drop the soap

ftfy :3
Oh my God. I could hardly breathe. You have to make another.............top Lane perhaps?

That ending made me laugh my shiny metal ass off.
Really brightened up my day.
*Slams thread on the floor, shattering it* ANOTHER!
Looks like Taric is going in. GEMS DEEP.
Poor Kog :C

Later, after a team fight.

{{champion:82}}  Who is my support?
{{champion:78}}  (is a ghost) I am your support.
{{champion:82}} And so is Sona now!
{{champion:37}}  You called, Morde?
{{champion:82}} Yes, let us obtain my long-awaited Dragon support, I am disgusted with this yordle.
Poppy is the mister popo of this game
When they rework Poppy, I want her to be like this. I mean, like she already is, but with her own words XD

> Poppy, I'm sure you know I just want to show my marksman...
_The ins and outs of being my partner._

LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL
This is gold

As a Taric Main and a lover of Poppy, I approve of this post
Anyone else think that LolliPoppy looks like a retarded Oompa Loompa high on candy?

Beautiful, man... Beautiful {{item:3070}} 

I'd love to see more of these... "interactions" between champions. You really did a good job on this
Need to give Poppy a Lucy Van Pelt skin.  Maybe with a giant football on the end of her hammer.
